name: Pradhan Mantri KISAN Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: To provide income support to all landholding farmers' families to supplement their financial needs.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: To provide insurance coverage and financial support to farmers in the event of crop failure.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana (PMKSY)
description: To enhance irrigation coverage and improve water use efficiency in a focused manner.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maan-Dhan Yojana (PM-KMY)
description: To provide social security to small and marginal farmers in their old age.

name: Krishi Kalyan Abhiyan
description: To aid, assist and advise farmers on the best agricultural practices and enhance their incomes.

name: Soil Health Cards (SHC) Scheme
description: To promote soil test-based and balanced use of fertilizers to enable farmers to realize higher yields.

name: National Bamboo Mission
description: To promote the growth of the bamboo sector through area-based, regionally differentiated strategy.

name: Green Revolution – Krishonnati Yojana
description: To develop the agriculture and allied sectors in a holistic and sustainable manner.

name: Yuva Sahakar-Cooperative Enterprise Support and Innovation Scheme
description: To encourage cooperatives to take up innovative ventures for socio-economic development.

name: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay SanraksHan Abhiyan (PM-AASHA)
description: To ensure remunerative prices to the farmers for their produce.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: To promote organic farming and improve soil health.

name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: To increase the production of rice, wheat, pulses, coarse cereals, and commercial crops.

name: Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyay Unnat Krishi Shiksha Yojana (PDDUUKSY)
description: To promote agricultural education and research in the country.

name: Rashtriya Gokul Mission (RGM)

description: To develop and conserve indigenous bovine breeds for improving their genetic makeup and increasing the milk production.

name: National Beekeeping and Honey Mission (NBHM)
description: To promote holistic growth of the beekeeping industry for income and employment generation.

name: National Mission on Edible Oils (NMEO-OP)

name: National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF)
description: To promote natural farming practices across the country for sustainable agriculture.

name: National Scheme of Welfare of Fishermen (NSWF)
ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
description: To provide financial assistance to fishers for housing, insurance, and other social security measures.

name: Setu Bharatam
description: To free all national highways from railway level crossings and renovate old bridges by 2019.

name: Bharatmala
description: Develop border and international connectivity roads, coastal and port connectivity roads, and improve efficiency of national corridors and economic corridors.

name: National Highways Interconnectivity Improvement Project
description: Ensure safe, fast, and all-weather movement of traffic on National Highways in backward regions.

name: Logistic Efficiency Enhancement Programme (LEEP)

name: Vehicle Fleet Modernization Programme
description: Promote port-led direct and indirect development and provide infrastructure to transport goods to and from ports quickly, efficiently, and cost-effectively.

description: To improve the operational efficiency of major ports.

name: Green Ports Initiative

description: To make Indian ports more environmentally sustainable through eco-friendly practices.

name: Coastal Berth Scheme

name: National Waterways

description: To develop designated inland waterways for cargo and passenger transportation.

name: Coastal Shipping Promotion

ministry: Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways
description: To upgrade existing port infrastructure and introduce advanced technology for better efficiency.

name: Coastal Economic Zones (CEZs)

description: To promote port-led industrialization through the development of Coastal Economic Zones.

description: To provide funding support for infrastructure projects under the Sagarmala initiative.

name: Port-led Industrialization

description: To boost industrial growth by leveraging the proximity of industries to ports.

name: Saubhagya
description: To provide electricity connections to over 4 crore families in rural and urban areas by December 2018.

name: UDAY
description: Making all discoms profitable by 2018-19 through improving operational efficiencies, reducing power costs, reducing interest costs, and enforcing financial discipline on discoms.

name: Deendayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana (DUGJY)
description: To provide 24×7 uninterrupted electricity supply to each rural household across the country by 2022.

description: To provide 24×7 power availability to all households, industries, commercial businesses, and agriculture by FY 19.

name: Integrated Power Development Scheme (IPDS)
description: Strengthening sub-transmission and distribution network in urban areas, metering distribution transformers/feeders/consumers, and IT enablement of distribution sector.

name: National Smart Grid Mission (NSGM)
description: Implementation of a smart electrical grid with advanced technology in automation, communication, and IT systems to monitor and control power flows.

name: UJALA
description: To save energy by distributing energy-efficient LED bulbs.

name: TARANG, UJALA, VIDYUT PRAVAH, GARV, URJA, and MERIT
description: Enhance transparency in the power sector in line with the Digital India initiative.

name: Green Energy Corridors Project

name: India’s Street Lighting National Programme (SLNP)

name: SuryaMitra Programme

description: Provide skill training to rural youth in handling solar installations, aiming to create 50,000 trained solar photovoltaic technicians by March 2020.

name: National Mission for Enhanced Energy Efficiency (NMEEE)
description: Improve efficiency in energy-intensive sectors, provide a platform for energy efficiency financing, promote energy-efficient appliances, and develop fiscal instruments for energy efficiency financing.

description:
- Identify sporting talent among students in the age group of 8–12 years
- Provide them with scientific training and support

name: Amendment to the Scheme for Flexibility in Generation and Scheduling of Thermal/Hydro Power Stations
description: Deletion of specific paras (9.2 and 9.4.3) to enhance flexibility in generation and scheduling.

name: Biogas Programme under the Umbrella scheme of National Bio Energy Programme
ministry: Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (Biogas Division)
description: Continued implementation of the National Bioenergy Programme from FY 2021-22 to 2025-26 with a budget of Rs. 858 crore for Phase-I.

name: Extension of Phase-II of Grid Connected Rooftop Solar programme
description: Extend the Grid Connected Rooftop Solar programme Phase-II until 31.03.2026 without additional financial application.

name: Solarisation of Sun-Temple Town of Modhera, Gujarat
description: Achieve 100% solarization of Modhera, fulfilling domestic and agricultural electricity needs through solar energy and setting up a pilot project for a village or town running entirely on solar power.

name: Biomass Programme under the Umbrella scheme of National Bioenergy Programme
ministry: Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (Biomass Division)
description: Implement Phase-I of the National Bioenergy Programme with a budget of Rs. 858 crore, continuing the programme from FY 2021-22 to 2025-26.

name: Production Linked Incentive Scheme (Tranche II) under National Programme on High Efficiency Solar PV Modules
description: Allocate 39600 MW of domestic Solar PV module manufacturing capacity with an outlay of Rs. 14007 crore, expected to generate significant employment and become operational in phases from October 2024 to April 2026.

name: Clarification on applicability of central financial assistance under Rooftop Solar Programme Phase-II
description: Clarify the applicability of central financial assistance for solar systems installed under the Virtual Net Metering arrangement.

name: Extension of Pradhan Mantri Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyaan (PM-KUSSUM)
description: Boost solar power installation in rural areas and extend the PM-KUSUM scheme until March 2026.

name: Carbon Credit Trading Scheme 2023
description: Establish a platform for trading carbon credits to control greenhouse gas emissions, encouraging entities to minimize their carbon footprint.

name: Development of Solar Parks and Ultra Mega Solar Power Projects
ministry: Ministry of New & Renewable Energy National Solar Mission Division
description: Extend the Solar Park Scheme timeline until FY 2025-26, facilitating the development of solar parks and ultra mega solar power projects without additional financial implications.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mahila Shakti Kendra

description: To empower rural women through community engagement and training.

name: National Scheme of Incentive to Girls for Secondary Education

name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Surakshit Abhiyan

name: Support to Training and Employment Program (STEP)

description: To provide skills that give employability to women and to provide competencies and skills that enable women to become self-employed/entrepreneurs.

name: Mahila Shakti Kendra (MSK)
ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: To empower rural women through community participation, and create an environment for social change through skill development.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)

description: To promote apprenticeship training and to increase the engagement of women in apprenticeships by providing financial incentives to employers.

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
description: To transform rural poor youth into an economically independent and globally relevant workforce, with a special focus on empowering women.

name: Nai Roshni
description: To empower and instill confidence among minority women by providing knowledge, tools, and techniques for interacting with government systems, banks, and other institutions at all levels.

description: To empower rural women through skill development and capacity building activities.

name: Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA)

description: To enhance access to secondary education and improve its quality.

name: Mid-Day Meal Scheme (MDMS)

name: Samagra Shiksha
description: To ensure inclusive and equitable quality education from pre-school to senior secondary stage.

name: National Scheme of Incentive to Girls for Secondary Education
description: To promote enrollment of girls in secondary education, especially those belonging to SC/ST communities.

name: Kasturba Gandhi Balika Vidyalaya (KGBV)
description: To provide quality education for girls from disadvantaged groups in upper primary and secondary levels.

name: Pandit Madan Mohan Malaviya National Mission on Teachers and Teaching (PMMMNMTT)

name: Nai Udaan

name: Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM)

name: Namami Gange Programme

name: Atal Bhujal Yojana (Atal Jal)

name: National Water Mission

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana (PMKSY)
description: To enhance water use efficiency in agriculture and expand irrigation coverage through various techniques.

name: Flood Management and Border Areas Programme (FMBAP)
description: To provide financial assistance for effective flood management and protection of riverbanks in border areas.

name: Repair, Renovation and Restoration (RRR) of Water Bodies
description: To restore and rejuvenate traditional water bodies and improve their storage capacity.

name: Water Quality Monitoring and Surveillance Programme
description: To monitor and improve the quality of drinking water in rural areas.

name: National Aquifer Mapping and Management Programme (NAQUIM)
description: To delineate and characterize aquifers in the country to facilitate sustainable groundwater management.

name: Command Area Development and Water Management (CADWM)
description: To improve the utilization of irrigation potential created and enhance agricultural productivity.

name: Central Sector Scheme for Ground Water Recharge and Water Conservation
description: To enhance groundwater resources in over-exploited areas through recharge and conservation measures.

name: Polavaram Project
description: To develop a multipurpose project on the Godavari River for irrigation, water supply, and hydropower.

name: Sustainable Water Resources Development
description: To ensure the sustainable development and management of water resources across the country.

name: Water Resources Information System (WRIS)
description: To provide a comprehensive and reliable water resources information system for informed decision-making.

name: Minor Irrigation Census
description: To collect data on minor irrigation schemes for better planning and management.

name: National Ganga River Basin Authority (NGRBA)
description: To plan and implement policies for the cleaning and conservation of the Ganga River.

name: Ganga Action Plan
description: To clean and rejuvenate the Ganga River by controlling pollution and improving water quality.

name: Yamuna Action Plan
description: To improve the water quality of the Yamuna River and address pollution control measures.

name: National Mission for Clean Ganga (NMCG)
description: To ensure effective implementation of projects under the Namami Gange Programme.

name: Accelerated Rural Water Supply Programme (ARWSP)
description: To ensure the provision of safe drinking water in rural areas.

name: Jal Kranti Abhiyan
description: To consolidate water conservation and management initiatives through community participation.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan SAMPADA Yojana (PMKSY)
description:
To provide a mechanism to link agricultural production to 
the market by bringing together farmers, processors, and 
retailers.

name:
PM Formalisation of Micro food processing 
Enterprises (PMFME) Scheme
description:
To promote the One District One Product (ODOP) approach 
to reap the benefits of scale in terms of procurement of 
inputs, availing common services, and marketing of products.
To provide seed capital to Self Help Groups (SHGs) and support 
for common infrastructure, branding, and marketing.
focus:
SHG Support,
Infrastructural Support at
micro level

name: Operation Greens
description:
To promote farmer producers organizations, agri-logistics, 
processing facilities, and professional management.
focus:
Support to Farmers,
Logistical Support,
Infrastructural Support

name: Mega Food Park
description:
To ensure maximizing value addition, minimizing wastages, 
increasing farmers' income, and creating employment 
opportunities, particularly in the rural sector.
focus:
Rural Sector Employment,
Market Place creation,

name: Cold Chain and Value Addition Infrastructure Scheme
description:
To facilitate the establishment of a strong cold chain facility for 
agricultural, horticultural, dairy, fish & marine, poultry & meat 
products.

name: Modernisation of Abattoirs
description:
To modernize and upgrade the existing abattoirs to improve 
the quality and hygiene of meat production. To ensure 
compliance with the food safety and quality standards.

name:
PM Formalisation of Micro food processing 
Enterprises (PMFME) Scheme
description:
To support the upgradation of individual micro food processing units. 
To promote the One District One Product (ODOP)  approach to reap 
the benefits of scale in terms of procurement of  inputs, availing 
common services, and marketing of products
focus:
Micro Unit support,
Rural Development and 
Scaling

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description:
Provides financial assistance to minority students from
 Class I to X to encourage education.

name: Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description:
Offers scholarships for students from Class XI to PhD, 
supporting higher education.

name: Merit-cum-Means Based Scholarship Scheme
description:
Targets students pursuing professional and technical 
courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

name: Maulana Azad National Fellowship Scheme
description:
Financial assistance for students pursuing higher education,
 particularly for those taking the CSIR-UGC NET exam.

name: Naya Savera
description:
A free coaching scheme for students from minority 
communities to help them qualify for competitive examinations.

name: Padho Pardesh
description:
Provides interest subsidies on educational loans for overseas 
studies for students belonging to minority communities.

name: Nai Udaan
description:
Support for minority candidates clearing preliminary 
examinations for various competitive services.

name: Seekho Aur Kamao (Learn & Earn)
description:
A skill development initiative aimed at youth aged 14-35 to 
enhance employability.

name: USTTAD
description:
Focuses on upgrading skills and training in traditional arts and 
crafts, providing a platform for artisans.

name: Nai Manzil
description:
A scheme for providing formal education and skill training to 
school dropouts.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Vikas Karyakram (PMJVK)
description:
Aims to improve infrastructure in minority concentration areas, 
including education and health facilities.

name: Hamari Dharohar
description:
A scheme aimed at preserving the rich cultural heritage of 
minority communities.

name: Jiyo Parsi
description:
Focuses on reversing the declining population of Parsis in India 
through various interventions.

name: Pradhan Mantri Virasat Ka Samvardhan (PM VIKAS)
description:
An integrated scheme combining several initiatives to promote 
the cultural heritage of minority communities and support 
traditional crafts.

name: National Minorities Development & Finance Corporation (NMDFC)
description:
Provides concessional loans for self-employment and 
income-generating ventures.

name: Equity to NMDFC
description:
Supports the financing of minority community projects to 
enhance economic opportunities.

name:
Prime Minister’s Employment 
Generation Programme (PMEGP)
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To generate employment opportunities through the 
establishment of new self-employment ventures. 
Financial assistance for setting up new enterprises, 
with a subsidy of 15% to 35% of the project cost, 
depending on the category of the enterprise.

name:
Credit Guarantee Scheme for Micro & 
Small Enterprises (CGTMSE)
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To provide credit guarantees to banks and financial 
institutions for loans extended to micro and small 
enterprises. Encourages banks to lend to MSMEs 
without requiring collateral, thus improving access 
to finance.

name:
Micro & Small Enterprises Cluster 
Development Programme (MSE-CDP)
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To promote cluster-based development of MSMEs. 
Financial assistance for infrastructure development, 
technology upgradation, and skill development.

name:
Scheme of Fund for Regeneration of 
Traditional Industries (SFURTI)
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To promote traditional industries through the 
development of clusters. Financial support for 
technology upgradation and marketing assistance.

name: National SC-ST Hub Scheme
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To promote entrepreneurship among Scheduled 
Castes and Scheduled Tribes.
focus:
Financial Support, Skill 
Development, and 
Marketing support.

name:
Entrepreneurship Skill Development 
Programme (ESDP)
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To enhance the entrepreneurial skills of individuals. 
Training programs to develop skills necessary for 
starting and managing a business.

name: Self Reliant India (SRI) Fund
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To provide financial support to stressed MSMEs. 
Credit guarantee for subordinate debt to help 
MSMEs recover and grow.

name:
Technology and Quality Upgradation 
Support to MSMEs
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To promote the adoption of energy-efficient 
technologies. Financial assistance for upgrading 
technology and improving production processes.

name:
ISO 9000 Certification and 
Reimbursement Scheme
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To encourage MSMEs to obtain ISO 9000 certification. 
Reimbursement of expenses incurred in obtaining the 
certification.

name:
Small Industry Cluster Development 
Program Scheme
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To promote cluster-based development of small 
industries.  Financial assistance for infrastructure 
development and capacity building.

name:
Integrated Infrastructural 
Development Schemes (IID)
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To develop industrial infrastructure in rural and 
semi-urban areas. Financial support for the 
establishment of industrial estates.

name:
MSME Marketing Development 
Assistance (MDA) Scheme
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
To assist MSMEs in marketing their products. 
Financial support for marketing initiatives.

name: International Cooperation (IC) Scheme
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
Financial support to participate in international 
exhibitions, trade fairs, and buyer-seller meets. Focuses 
on building the capacity of MSMEs, particularly 
first-time exporters, through training and development 
programs.
focus:
Financial Support, Skill 
Development, and 
Marketing support.

name:
TREAD (Trade Related Entrepreneurship 
Assistance and Development) for Women
ministry:
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises 
(MoMSME)
description:
Supports women entrepreneurs in trade with financial 
assistance and training.

name: Aadhaar Enabled PDS (AePDS)
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
description:
The AePDS scheme aims to digitize and streamline 
the public distribution system (PDS) by linking ration 
cards to Aadhaar numbers. This helps improve 
transparency and target benefits to eligible beneficiaries.

name:
Active Inactive ARDs 
(Authorized Ration Depots)
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
description:
This scheme tracks the active and inactive status of authorized 
ration depots that distribute essential commodities through the 
PDS. It helps monitor the operational status of the distribution 
network.

name: Defunct Ration Shops
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
description:
Certain ration shops have become inactive or defunct over time, 
often due to lack of demand or operational issues. Monitoring 
and reviving these inactive shops is an ongoing challenge for the 
ministry.

name:
Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana 
(PMGKAY)
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
description:
Under this scheme, free food grains are being distributed through 
the Targeted Public Distribution System (TPDS) among priority 
households (PHH), Antyodaya Anna Yojana (AAY) and other eligible 
beneficiaries under the National Food Security Act (NFSA).

name:
Sugar Subsidy under Public Distribution 
System
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
description:
This provides subsidy for supplying sugar at a subsidized rate to 
families covered under the Antyodaya Anna Yojana (AAY) through 
the PDS.

name:
Assistance to States for Intra-State Movement 
of Foodgrains
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
description:
This provides assistance to states for intra-state movement of food 
grains and fair price shop (FPS) dealers' margins under the NFSA.

name:
Fortification of Rice and its Distribution under 
PDS
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
description:
This scheme aims to fortify rice distributed under the PDS with 
micronutrients to address malnutrition.

name:
Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of 
(Hybrid and) Electric Vehicles in India 
(FAME-India) Scheme
description:
This scheme aims to promote the adoption of electric and 
hybrid vehicles in India. It provides demand incentives for 
e-2Ws, e-3Ws, e-4Ws and e-buses. As of December 2023, 
over 11.5 lakh electric vehicles have received subsidies 
amounting to Rs. 5,228 crore under FAME-II. Over 
6,800 e-buses have been sanctioned or are being 
deployed under this scheme.

name:
Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme 
for Automobile and Auto Components
description:
The PLI scheme provides financial incentives to boost domestic 
manufacturing of advanced automotive technology products. It 
aims to attract investments, create economies of scale, build a 
robust supply chain and reduce import dependence. The 
scheme has an outlay of Rs. 26,058 crore over 5 years.

name:
Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme 
for Advanced Chemistry Cell (ACC) Battery 
Storage
description:
To enhance India's manufacturing capabilities for ACC batteries, 
the government approved a PLI scheme with an outlay of 
Rs.18,100 crore over 7 years.

name:
Scheme for Enhancement of Competitiveness 
in the Indian Capital Goods Sector
description:
This scheme aims to enhance the competitiveness of the Indian 
capital goods sector by increasing investments, indigenizing 
technologies and creating common service infrastructure. 
32 projects with a total cost of Rs. 1,363.78 crore have been 
sanctioned so far under Phase-II of this scheme.
focus:
Market Expansion, 
Technology Support, 
Service Infrastructure

name: GST Exemption Certificate Scheme
description:
The "GST Exemption Certificate Scheme" has been introduced 
by the Department of Heavy Industries, Ministry of Heavy 
Industries for issuing certificates to Persons with Disabilities 
(PwDs) having a disability percentage equal to or greater than 40%. 
The scheme provides GSC Concession to orthopedically disabled 
persons on purchase of a car.
